item.description:
It has been suggested that our Beermuda Triangle adventure in early October was so memorable that we ought to repeat it. So I consulted my steering committee and they chose the date of Thursday, December 9.

Meet at 6:00 at E & O Tap at 289 Knight St. Around 7:30 we will move to The Avery, 18 Luongo Memorial Sq. At 9 we will hear the call of Julians (318 Broadway). (And they really don't use an apostrophe in their adverts, for all you punctuation sticklers out there.)

Meet us at just one or join us as we bar-hop. Park once and walk to all three. (Hopefully, no cars will be towed this time.)

You've heard the stories. Come join us as we try to recreate the magic. See you there!
item.name: Beermuda Triangle II
